scripts.content:
Beginner's Files
						
						From BambiSleep Wiki
						
						Jump to:navigation, search
					
					
						

						Foundational Training
Much like with any new experience, knowing where to start is the first, and most important step on your journey with Bambi Sleep and Bambi hypnosis. Below, we have compiled our suggestions for where you should start in your bimbofication journey. 

Playlists



Bimbo Slavedoll Refresher - Bambi Prime (Length: 1h 11m)
Newcomers to the Bambi Sleep experience should absolutely begin with the Bimbo Slavedoll Refresher playlist right off the bat. This is a subset of the full Slavedoll session that trains the core BS triggers. After training with these files for a minimum of seven days, you'll be ready to move on to intermediate training plans catered to what you want your Bambi to be!





The Pink Path - Bellmar (Length: 1h 27m)
It may be listed as an intermediate playlist, but the beauty of The Pink Path is in its first file: Bambi 101: FA&FO. This file is designed as a thirty-minute introduction to BS; training the core triggers: Bambi Sleep, Good Girl and Bambi Freeze. Bambi Purge Protection will safeguard against the impulse to quit and purge yourself from the BS experience; Giggle Trap will train Bambi to forget sessions and suggestions, making her an "obedient giggle doll".





Bubbly Bisexual Bambi - playlist by NaturallyNavi (Length: 1h 36m)
Taking the foundation of the Bimbo Slavedoll Refresher and adding a few files to encourage bisexuality in Bambis who want to worship cock and pussy, this playlist will train the same triggers as Slavedoll, while also adding the Plead for Pussy and Pussy Brain triggers.


Individual files/sessions



Bambi 101: FA & FO - Bellmar (Length: 39m)
Bambi 101: Fuck Around and Find Out is designed with two things in mind: 
1.) Answer some of the most common questions and explain some Bambi basics.
2.) Give trained Bambis a fun story with a post hypnotic suggestion, a little OS suppression, and some "Bambi Always Wins" fun.
This file trains the three basic triggers: Bambi Sleep, Good Girl and Bambi Freeze.





Bambi Sleep Deep Conditioner (Subliminal) - Bambi Subliminals (Length: 44m) (Patreon Exclusive File)
The Bambi Sleep Deep Conditioner exclusively and deeply trains Bambi Sleep, which will open the door to every other file that you work with after. Getting into that trance state is important, and Bambi Sleep is the gateway for beginners to start to embrace the journey.







Retrieved from "https://bambisleep.info/index.php?title=Beginner%27s_Files&oldid=599"
